Our Mission

Welcome back [username]!

NAFVA’s mission is to provide a simple, national solution for Facility Owners and Managers across multiple commercial sectors and industries to meet and connect directly with top rated Service Professionals, vendors, and supplier’s.

Our Goal

To help build productive and lasting relationships between quality top rated Facility Vendors and the Facility Owners and Managers that need their services. Our goal is to redefine the future of how facility managers will source new vendors.  We believe that a REWARD for vendors doing excellent work for their clients is not payment for services provided, but rather the reward of opportunity for more work.
